title: Lightning logo
content:
Hi   
I'am busy working on an logo for an branche-organisation for lightning.   
   
Please, will you give your opinion.   
   
Thanks   
Nicolien
author: Nicolien

comments.content:
Thanks for the warning Tiffany. It is curious, when I checked it this afternoon there were two messages. Here it comes again.

nla.pdf
nla.pdf (15.7 k)
I'd say, try offering more space (and even space) around the yellow characters - the A bothers me a bit...not on the same baseline and all.
How is the logo being used? Is for stationary or signage?

Hi Daniel, The logo is for stationary and the usage in word-documents. I made some little approvements as Tanya says. There most be more space around the yellow characters. (with my excuses for using bad english language) Nicolien.


NLA-01.pdf (186.0 k)
Nicolien do you have a stacked version? It might be necessary in certain applications like a business card.
